actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families

official_title: To require a comprehensive effort by the Department of Education and the National Institute on Child Health and Human Development to widely disseminate the results of the National Reading Panel report to teachers, parents, and universities.

summary.text: Reading Research Dissemination Act - Directs the Department of Education and the National Institute on Child Health and Human Development to: (1) develop a coordinated effort to disseminate the information of the National Reading Panel (NRP) report to private and public school teachers, principals, and parents; and (2) work with institutions of higher education and programs that train teachers to use methods of teaching which incorporate the ideas reported by NRP.

titles.title: To require a comprehensive effort by the Department of Education and the National Institute on Child Health and Human Development to widely disseminate the results of the National Reading Panel report to teachers, parents, and universities.
